venueDetails.keyword: TMS Art Gallery, batik centre, art venue
venueDetails.title: TMS Art Gallery
venueDetails.short_description: TMS Art specialises in batik, and pride itself as a one-stop batik centre, where it not only...
venueDetails.description: TMS Art specialises in batik, and pride itself as a one-stop batik centre, where it not only engage in advertisements, art, craft & music workshops, promotion and marketing, but also provide spaces for exhibitions for all art types.

location.address: No 301, Jalan Bandar 11, Taman Melawati, KL

venueDetails.keyword: Stadt, German Cuisine, Bistro, german tradition
venueDetails.title: Stadt
venueDetails.short_description: Hankering for real German food to accompany that cold beer of yours? Then Stadt is the place just for you....
venueDetails.description:
Hankering for real German food to accompany that cold beer of yours? Then Stadt is the place just for you.

Stadt specializes in authentic German cuisine, featuring original recipe of German favourites such as German Grilled steak, sausages, and their specialty, crispy pork knuckle.

Stadt also serves a wonderful selection of German and local beers. So, beers and meat, heavenly, ain't it so?

Stadt Puchong: (see side bar)

Stadt Kepong: No 2, Jalan Metro Perdana 8, Taman Usahawan Kepong, Kepong Utara, 52100 KL. 03 6250 1016

location.address: Stadt, No. 50 & 50-1, Jalan Puteri 1/4, Bandar Puteri, 47100 Puchong.

venueDetails.keyword: Munich Gastro Bierhaus, authentic german cuisine, fresh beer,
venueDetails.title: Munich Gastro Bierhaus
venueDetails.short_description: Munich Gastro Bierhaus is a conceptualised lifestyle German bierhaus cum restaurant, great for socialising...
venueDetails.description:
Munich Gastro Bierhaus is a conceptualised lifestyle German bierhaus cum restaurant, great for socialising with your friends and colleagues while enjoying the variety fresh draught beers, selected bottled beers, wines, whisky and authentic German cuisine. The selections of draughts include Franziskaner (German), Hoegaarden (Belgium), Erdinger (German) and Carlsberg (Malaysia).

Football fans are not left out, as the outlet also features three large television screens for your never-missed viewing pleasures.

location.address: Munich Gastro Bierhaus , C-GF-46, Ioi Boulevard, Jalan Kenari 5, Bandar Puchong Jaya, 47170, Puchong

venueDetails.keyword: Si Chuan Dou Hua preview, Sichuan cuisine, Chinese, Park Royal Hotel, non halal
venueDetails.title: Si Chuan Dou Hua
venueDetails.short_description: For arguably the best Sichuan cuisine in town, head to Park Royal Hotel in the central street of Jalan Sultan Ismail...
venueDetails.description:
Sichuan cuisine is known for its sharp taste and numbing effect that stays long in your mouth. For arguably the best in town head to Parkroyal Hotel in the central street of Jalan Sultan Ismail. The best of the overall satisfying menu includes eight treasure seafood soup, double-boiled minced chicken dou hua soup and sliced pork in garlic and chilli sauce.

Non Halal

location.address: Lower Level, Parkroyal Kuala Lumpur, Jalan Sultan Ismail, KL

venueDetails.keyword: Shanghai preview, Shanghainese cuisine, Chinese, Shanghai pancakes, authentic, JW Marriott
venueDetails.title: Shanghai
venueDetails.short_description: You can feel the regal ambience courtesy of the black wood dining chairs and quaint Chinese paintings...
venueDetails.description: As you would expect, this outlet offers authentic Shanghainese cuisine. The dishes are generally excellent and come in plentiful variety. The Shanghai pancakes with red bean is a treat while Chinese tea connoisseurs will have a field day. You can feel the regal ambience courtesy of the black wood dining chairs and quaint Chinese paintings.Â

location.address: JW Marriott, 183 Jalan Bukit Bintang, KL
